description: Stores the metadata information about a feature on a form.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Amplify app.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is part of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: featureName
parameters.description: The name of the feature associated with the metadata.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The metadata information to store. The new information to store.
